body_html:
Yep, we're trying to do everything in ATen as much as possible. Sometimes it's not possible, but when it is, it's preferred.

If MKL has got a good CPU implementation, it's definitely a good pick.
body_text:
Yep, we're trying to do everything in ATen as much as possible. Sometimes it's not possible, but when it is, it's preferred.
If MKL has got a good CPU implementation, it's definitely a good pick.
body:
Yep, we're trying to do everything in ATen as much as possible. Sometimes it's not possible, but when it is, it's preferred.

If MKL has got a good CPU implementation, it's definitely a good pick.
